Hey 80zforever, your my last chance of finding a copy of Weather Prophets albums especially "Mayflower". I'm not sure if they existed during the 80's but their music is quite good but nobody seems to post it anywhere. Hope you had their albums and post it here. Thanks. I've downloaded a lot of your posts here. Great job. I'm into rare 80's too.

MfP was a favourite band of mine back in their time, I own a few singles with them including the great song "Fuel to the Fire". It's a shock to me that it's been so difficult to find their music on the net, or indeed any info whatsoever.

 Unfortunately I'm too late here, no seeders, both major thanks anyway for this and loads of other great uploads, 80z!!  

I hope I'll be able to find this album at a later time.

Just a heads up: this excellent album is now being re-seeded over here:
